A federal court judge in Georgia denied: s motion to dismiss a defamation suit brought against the network by a former hospital executive.
The ruling denying CNN: s motion to dismiss did not state (or even insinuate) that CNN is "fake news," nor did it force a "shocking punishment" on the news network.
The claim originated from a blog post pu: which reported that a federal judge had ruled CNN as "fake news" and imposed a punishment on them.
The defamation lawsuit against CNN was f: the former CEO of St. Mary's Medical Center, who accused CNN of airing false and defamatory news reports about the hospital's infant mortality rate.
